detail.title: Adidas Campus Pharrell Williams Ecru Tint
detail.desc: adidas and Pharrell Williams are a match made in heaven, so it’s hardly surprising these Campus sneakers are jam-packed with cool style. Reworking the ‘70s b-ball silhouette, they’re constructed with luxe leather uppers that come in the palette of creamy hues – think off-white, beige and clear brown – and then detailed with the signature serrated three-stripes and triangular perforations at the sidewalls. To finish, they’re accented at the tongues with zesty lemon laces and then detailed with the triangular ‘Hu’ debossing.
detail.color: Ecru Tint / Cream White / Clear Brown

tabs.desc: Adidas is back with their latest Yeezy Boost 350 V2. Fresh off the heels of NBA All-Star Weekend, these Yeezy's are nicknamed the 'Zebras,' and come in a classic white, black and red color scheme. Sporting a white-based Primeknit upper with black accents giving off a Zebra stripe vibe, “SPLY-350” displayed across the sides in red finished off by a translucent BOOST cushioned sole.
